title: 大佬帮我看看日志 我不会看
author: sszq
txt_content:
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 1/5/20 9:31 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.next(Unknown Source)
        at net.ilexiconn.llibrary.server.ServerEventHandler.onServerTickEvent(ServerEventHandler.java:166)

        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler.invoke(ASMEventHandler.java:90)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:191)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onPostServerTick(FMLCommonHandler.java:263)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:850)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:658)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
ConcurrentModificationException
是遍历过程中修改了集合所产生的错误
->如果不是必然发生 那么可能和异步操作有关

而另一方面抛出错误的地方 并不是 错误地进行异步修改的地方
导致很难找到造成错误的原因
